09-12-2024: - Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Seismic Impact|Size=20}} Seismic Impact getting stuck on ceilings like in the mid boss room
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Shoulder Charge|Size=20}} Shoulder Charge turn rate reduced a bit
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Infernal Resilience|Size=20}} Infernal Resilience reduced from 17% to 16%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Shoulder Charge|Size=20}} Shoulder Charge stun time reduced from 1s to 0.85s
08-29-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Infernal Resilience|Size=20}} Infernal Resilience Regeneration Time increased from 16s to 18s (this is a nerf)
- Now does pull ups on the zipline once again (this is a buff)
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Shoulder Charge|Size=20}} Shoulder Charge sometimes stunning enemies on stairs
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Seismic Impact|Size=20}} Seismic Impact sometimes not going to the area selected
08-15-2024: - Improved Abrams Siphon and {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Seismic Impact|Size=20}} Seismic Impact visuals to not obstruct player view as much
- Remastered Abrams, {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Pocket|Size=20}} Pocket, and Dynamo weapon fire sounds
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Seismic Impact|Size=20}} Seismic Impact often not dragging enemies in the air along with you when you are slamming down
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Shoulder Charge|Size=20}} Shoulder Charge not always placing enemies in front of you
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Seismic Impact|Size=20}} Seismic Impact damage reduced from 175 to 150
08-01-2024: - Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Abrams|Size=20}} Abrams' Charge and Siphon pings not playing the correct VO
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Shoulder Charge|Size=20}} Shoulder Charge not stunning the target when colliding with Kelvin's Ice Dome
- Fixed some cases where {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Shoulder Charge|Size=20}} Shoulder Charge did not stun when hitting a wall
- Fixed enemies being able to double jump out of {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Seismic Impact|Size=20}} Seismic Impact
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Shoulder Charge|Size=20}} Shoulder Charge T3 reduced from +6.5 to +5.5 Weapon Damage
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Seismic Impact|Size=20}} Seismic Impact damage reduced from 200 to 175
07-18-2024: - Added additional voice lines for {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Abrams|Size=20}} Abrams
- Shoulder Charge now considers {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Spectral Wall|Size=20}} Spectral Wall and Frozen Shelter as walls
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Infernal Resilience|Size=20}} Infernal Resilience duration to regen increased from 14s to 16s (this is a nerf)
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Infernal Resilience|Size=20}} Infernal Resilience damage regenerated reduced from 18% to 17%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Infernal Resilience|Size=20}} Infernal Resilience T3 increased from +8% to +9%
- Improved reliability of {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Seismic Impact|Size=20}} Seismic Impact
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Seismic Impact|Size=20}} Seismic Impact base radius increased from 6m to 9m
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Seismic Impact|Size=20}} Seismic Impact T1 changed from +4m Impact Radius to -40s Cooldown
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Seismic Impact|Size=20}} Seismic Impact T3 moved to T2 (was -70s Cooldown)
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Seismic Impact|Size=20}} Seismic Impact T3 is now Gains Unstoppable while in air and 3s after landing
07-11-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Shoulder Charge|Size=20}} Shoulder Charge speed increased by 25%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Shoulder Charge|Size=20}} Shoulder Charge distance increased by 15%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Shoulder Charge|Size=20}} Shoulder Charge now stuns enemies for 1s if it drags them into a wall
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Infernal Resilience|Size=20}} Infernal Resilience now provides +1 Health Regen
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Infernal Resilience|Size=20}} Infernal Resilience damage regenerated reduced from 20% to 18%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Infernal Resilience|Size=20}} Infernal Resilience T3 changed to +8% damage regenerated
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Siphon Life|Size=20}} Siphon Life not healing you against shields
06-27-2024: - Improved {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Abrams|Size=20}} Abrams animation while hovering in the air during his ultimate and adjusted the downward acceleration animation
06-20-2024: - Improved misc issues with {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Seismic Impact|Size=20}} Seismic Impact collision
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Seismic Impact|Size=20}} Seismic Impact can be held for up to 3 seconds. Press the ability again anytime to land.
06-13-2024: - Heroes HP growth per boon increased by +5 (there are 11 instances of these). This is not done for Abrams or {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Dynamo|Size=20}} Dynamo.
- Base health regen reduced from 2 to 1
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Infernal Resilience|Size=20}} Infernal Resilience T1 reduced from +2 HP Regen to +1.5
06-06-2024: - Base HP growth reduced from 36 to 32
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Infernal Resilience|Size=20}} Infernal Resilience T2 reduced from +200 Health to +150
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Seismic Impact|Size=20}} Seismic Impact personal brief busy state upon landing increased from 0.2s to 0.3s
05-30-2024: - Added new sprint animations for {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Abrams|Size=20}} Abrams
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Seismic Impact|Size=20}} Seismic Impact is now faster to play out
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Seismic Impact|Size=20}} Seismic Impact now has a very brief busy state upon landing
05-23-2024: - Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Abrams|Size=20}} Abrams getting stuck on department store facade when using his ult
- Adjusted timing of select {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Abrams|Size=20}} Abrams impact lines to time with either the rise of his leap or the descent accordingly
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Siphon Life|Size=20}} Siphon Life T1 and T2 swapped
- Shoulder charge now allows for a bit more steering control
05-10-2024: - Reduced chances that Leap gets stuck on geometry during the downward phase
